name: Balmoral - Anejo XO Oscuro - Gran Toro
additionalNotes: Artfully handmade in the Dominican Republic by Royal Agio Cigars, the Balmoral Anejo XO Oscuro is a full-strength cigar with a handsome Oscuro San Andrés, Mexican wrapper, a Dominican Republic binder, and a uniquely blended filler composed of tobaccos from Nicaragua, Brazil, and the Dominican Republic. According to Boris Wintermans, CEO of Royal Agio Cigars, their commitment is to “… ultimately deliver an enjoyable, one-of-a-kind experience for cigar lovers.”
